ideas.title: VCs predict enterprises will spend more on AI in 2026 — through fewer vendors
ideas.description: Enterprises have been experimenting with AI tools for a few years. Investors predict they will start to pick winners in 2026.
hooks: AI Investment Showdown: VCs Reveal Enterprise Strategy
2026: How Enterprises Will Actually Spend AI Dollars
Fewer Vendors, More AI: Investors' Bold Prediction

tips: Use multi-person panel format to increase engagement
Prepare pre-submitted audience Q&A questions in advance
Enable live chat for real-time audience interaction

visualDirection.description: High-energy visual design with dynamic split-screen layouts, futuristic data visualization overlays, pulsing gradient backgrounds in deep blues and electric teals. Typography should feel technical yet approachable - sans-serif with slight geometric edge. Incorporate real-time data animation and investor quote callouts.

exampleOutline: Opening: Live Stream Introduction & Panel Intro
Market Context: Current AI Enterprise Landscape
VC Insights: Spending Trends & Vendor Consolidation

ideas.title: The 10 best vehicles Ars Technica drove in 2025
ideas.description: The 10 best vehicles Ars Technica drove in 2025
hooks: 10 Mind-Blowing Cars That Redefined Driving in 2025
Future of Driving: Ars Technica's Top Vehicles Revealed
These Cars Will Blow Your Mind This Year

tips: Use dynamic screen transitions between vehicle showcases
Include picture-in-picture of test drive moments
Create chapter markers for each vehicle highlight
Use high-energy b-roll footage of vehicles in motion
Add performance graphics and spec overlays

visualDirection.description: High-energy automotive design aesthetic with sleek metallic gradients, sharp technological typography, dynamic motion graphics showing vehicle performance metrics, futuristic color palette of deep blues, silver, and electric accents. Incorporate holographic-style UI elements and smooth cinematic transitions between vehicle showcases.

exampleOutline: Section 3: Countdown of Top 10 Vehicles (2-3 min per vehicle)

ideas.title: Meta just bought Manus, an AI startup everyone has been talking about
ideas.description: Meta says it'll keep Manus running independently while weaving its agents into Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp, where Meta's own chatbot, Meta AI, is already available to users.
hooks: AI Acquisition: Meta's Bold Move to Dominate Social Media
Inside the Manus Takeover: Meta's Secret Weapon
How One Startup Could Reshape Social Media Forever

tips: Use archival footage and simulated tech interfaces
Include expert talking head interviews for credibility
Create dynamic screen transitions mimicking AI network connections

visualDirection.description: High-contrast blue and black color palette with electric blue accents. Futuristic motion graphics simulating AI neural networks. Typography with sharp, technical sans-serif fonts. Incorporate glitch effects and data visualization transitions. Aesthetic references: 'Black Mirror' visual style meets tech documentary approach.

exampleOutline: Cold Open: Dramatic AI acquisition moment
Historical Context: Meta's AI Strategy Evolution
Future Predictions and Call to Action

ideas.title: 2025 was the year AI got a vibe check
ideas.description: AI’s early-2025 spending spree featured massive raises and trillion-dollar infrastructure promises. By year’s end, hype gave way to a vibe check, with growing scrutiny over sustainability, safety, and business models.
hooks: AI's Reality Check: 5 Lessons from 2025's Wild Ride
Trillion-Dollar Promises vs. Real AI Impact
How AI Survived Its Biggest Vibe Check Yet

tips: Use screen recordings of key AI funding/news timelines
Create clear chapter markers for step-by-step learning flow

visualDirection.description: Futuristic data visualization aesthetic with dynamic motion graphics. High-contrast color palette (deep blues, electric oranges). Typography that feels technical but approachable. Animated infographic transitions showing AI investment/scrutiny timeline. Clean, bold geometric design elements suggesting technological precision and forward momentum.

exampleOutline: Section 3: Step-by-Step Breakdown of Market Shifts

ideas.title: The latest AI news we announced in December
ideas.description: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Dec_AI_Recap_still.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">Here are Google’s latest AI updates from December 2025
hooks: AI Just Changed Everything in December
The AI Breakthroughs No One's Talking About

tips: Use animated text overlays to highlight key AI updates
Include picture-in-picture screen recordings of actual AI interfaces
Create dynamic chapter markers for easy navigation

visualDirection.description: Bold, futuristic color palette with electric blues and deep purples. Dynamic motion graphics that simulate AI neural networks. Clean, geometric typography with subtle glitch effects. Incorporate abstract data visualization elements. Use high-contrast transitions that feel technological and cutting-edge.

exampleOutline: Context: Why December's AI updates matter (1-2 min)
Deep Dive: Specific Google AI innovations (3-5 min)
Technical Breakdown: How these changes impact tech (2-3 min)
Closing CTA: How viewers can leverage these updates (30s)
